channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump just delayed the U.S.’s TikTok ban — again. Will he face a lawsuit?
item.description: The White House says the president will grant another reprieve after two earlier orders that directed the Justice Department not to enforce a U.S. ban...

item.title: ‘It might be another Apple or Microsoft’: My wife invested $100K in one stock and it exploded 1,500%. Do we sell?
item.description: “She shops with coupons at TJ Maxx.”

item.title: Trump officials paused, then resumed immigration raids in key economic sectors. Industry leaders say they’re still hopeful about making their case.
item.description: But one immigration expert says he doesn’t expect any longer-term administration shift on raids — and thinks maybe the pause had no real effect.

item.title: U.S. added more than 1,000 millionaires every day last year, new report says
item.description: The world is getting richer, but different places are doing it at different speeds.

item.title: You’ll have to charge over $75,000 a year on the new Chase Sapphire Reserve card to get the most out of it
item.description: The new rewards card is raising its annual fee to almost $800, but cardholders must spend $75,000 to unlock its best perks. How to tell if the card wo...

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
